sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Hide the SLA Breakdown modules if the SLA engine version is 2010 as they are only supported in the 2011 version</description> <name>Hide SLA breakdown modules</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { if (gs.getProperty('com.snc.sla.engine.version','2010') !== '2011') new global.SLABreakdownUtils().setBreakdownModulesVisible(false); })();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-03-14 15:01:42</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5399cede57301300491dac11ac94f9f2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Hide SLA breakdown modules</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Service Level Management - Breakdowns" source="sn_sla_brkdwn">6c11c4f357201300ff01ac11ac94f982</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Service Level Management - Breakdowns">6c11c4f357201300ff01ac11ac94f982</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5399cede57301300491dac11ac94f9f2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-03-16 16:39:00</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
